element_text:
{"chunk": "to the percentage-of-completion method, according to
which work in progress is measured at the market value
of the work performed. The market value is measured on
the basis of the degree of completion at the balance
sheet date and the total anticipated income from each
work in progress. Completion is calculated as the
proportion of the costs incurred in relation to the
expected total costs of the individual work in progress.
When the market value of the individual work in progress
can not be measured reliably, the market value is", "context": "The chunk describes the company's accounting policy for recognizing contract work in progress on its balance sheet."}
